name: Reflections the Spa
description: Reflections the Spa at Harrah's Lake Tahoe integrates health and beauty treatments from around the globe, featuring Roman baths, Turkish steam, Finnish saunas, and Swedish massage. The spa offers comprehensive services including therapeutic facials, massage therapies, body treatments, and a full-service salon. Located within Harrah's Lake Tahoe in Stateline, the spa provides a tranquil retreat after a day on the slopes or the golf course. Holistic skin treatments and aromatherapy round out the offerings, designed to help guests reflect, relax, refresh, and revitalize.
shortDescription: Full-service spa at Harrah's Lake Tahoe with Roman baths, Finnish sauna, and therapeutic treatments.

faqs.question: How big is Reflections the Spa?
faqs.answer: The spa spans 10,000 square feet with treatment rooms, aesthetics center, salon, and fitness facilities.

faqs.question: Do they have a fitness center?
faqs.answer: Yes, a state-of-the-art fitness center is included with spa access.

faqs.question: Is it part of the Nugget Casino Resort?
faqs.answer: Yes, Reflections the Spa is located within the Nugget Casino Resort in Sparks, easily accessible for hotel guests.

testimonials.quote: Booked spa treatments at Reflections the Spa as part of our non-golfer package. Incredible facilities and the staff was very professional. Perfect option for the non-golfers in our group.

testimonials.quote: Reflections the Spa was exactly what we needed after 3 days of golf. GTHS built it into our package and it was a smart add. Everyone left feeling refreshed and ready for the next round.
